alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Kosciusko; Marshall; Pulaski; Starke (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 30 at 5:45PM EST until February 01 at 1:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Tippecanoe River near Ora affecting Fulton IN, Kosciusko, Pulaski, Starke and Marshall Counties. For the Tippecanoe River...including Ora, Winamac, Norway Dam... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tippecanoe River near Ora. * WHEN...Until early Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, The river is at flood stage...significant lowland and rural flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:45 PM EST Tuesday /3:45 PM CST Tuesday/ the stage was 11.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.0 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 1145 AM EST /1045 AM CST/.
